recipe.title: Sweet and Sour Red Cabbage
ingredients: 4 cups thinly sliced red cabbage (about 3/4 pound)
instructions: Heat oil in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and apple and sauté until golden, about 7 minutes. Add cabbage, vinegar, sugar and celery seed and cook until cabbage is crisp-tender and liquid is reduced to glaze, about 10 minutes. Mix in bacon. Season with salt and pepper.
